      • decide

        public final boolean decide​(java.lang.Double proba)
        Description copied from interface: DecisionFunction
        A function to make a decision based on a probablility. It draws a random number and returns true if the number is smaller than the proba argument, false otherwise. It may be used by end-users in their code, e.g.:
        Specified by:
        decide in interface DecisionFunction
        Parameters:
        proba - the probability of the decision
        Returns:
        true with probability = proba
